<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_1307894_cmms_model"> <x_1307894_cmms_model action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <aem_approved_date/> <alarms/> <asset_type display_value="Refrigerator">c5ef346d93314210397dbd6cebba10a8</asset_type> <assigned_to/> <classification/> <display_name/> <eol_date/> <identifier/> <internal_notes/> <known_as/> <last_pm_review_date>2022-09-07</last_pm_review_date> <maintenance>Schedules: monthly, 6 month Procedures: Monthly - Refrigerator / Freezer Check thermometer for accuracy Clean condenser, coils, and fans Check defroster heater Check defroster timer Check sight glass Check controls Check evaporator and condenser fan for proper operation Check door gaskets, handles, and latches Check for unusual noise and vibration
IF UNIT IS A FREEZER, Check for ice build up and defrost if found Check temp (use shop thermometer) and adjust as needed
CONTACT MANAGER IF OUT OF SPEC *** (Patient/Staff Food = 32-40 degrees) *** (All Staff Freezers = 32 degrees or below) *** (PYXIS and MEDICINE = 36 TO 46 degrees) Exception: Food Service Freezers need to be zero degrees or below. Contact Food Service Manager if not in spec.
Policy GH-FW-IC-4107
6 month - Refrigerator / Freezer Clean condenser Check electrical connections Check evaporator coil
Performed by: Scripps tech</maintenance> <maintenance_intervals/> <maintenance_standard>Matches other regulatory requirements</maintenance_standard> <maintenance_strategy>Preventive/Scheduled</maintenance_strategy> <manufacturer display_value="Follett">5af67ced93fd0210397dbd6cebba1029</manufacturer> <model_name>00128934</model_name> <model_number>00128934</model_number> <network_capability/> <phi_storage/> <picture/> <probability/> <processed_by/> <proposed_on/> <proposer_reviewed/> <reason_for_no_pm/> <references/> <risk/> <risk_score/> <severity/> <state>Active</state> <sub_state/> <sys_class_name>x_1307894_cmms_model</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-26 03:24:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b4b3ed2d93f14210397dbd6cebba109a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-26 19:51:40</sys_updated_on> <system/> <udi/> <useful_life_yrs/> <website/> </x_1307894_cmms_model> </record_update>
